title: Flipped Learning-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and adaptability to educational environments
context.additional_context: Large-scale language instruction in smartphone-centric environments emphasizing peer interaction and real-world application skills

learning_goals: Learners improve language structure analysis skills by over 30% through a flipped learning model
Learners improve communication engagement by over 40% through peer feedback activities
Learners enhance language test scores by 25% or more through weekly formative and summative assessments
Learners develop self-directed learning habits through O-PIRTAS model-based activities (summarizing, testing, projects)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
